tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: High-Risk Pregnancy Care,Caesarean Section (C Section),Complicated Pregnancy Treatment,
review:
“This gentle cesarean was amazing - the family had complete trust and open communication with their doctor and team, and every one of their wishes were granted. ⁣
⁣
For the moment of birth the nurse anesthetist leaned forward and offered to help mom to see, and upon Mom’s first glance her hand went up to reach for baby as we all heard “It’s a BOY!” Tears of joy and big smiles spread all around the OR and soon after this moment, he was on Mom’s chest ❤️⁣”

****** ***** *** ** * **** **** ******** She explains clearly to the patient about the treatment.. She is very supportive.. She helped me in getting a baby with normal delivery... 
Thank you mam...
*** ** **** **** ****** the way she speaks with the patients there feel good she explains every thing with clear manner

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: ** ***** ** ** ********* ****** ,she explains the patient in detail and she is very polite and friendly ,she treated me like a mother **** **** ****** ** ***********
